name: Ohaha Family Foundation
headAddress: Suite B12, Murg Mall, Area 10, Garki
goal: Ohaha Family Foundation is on a mission to defend human dignity and provides well-being services to alleviate human suffering and poverty to people cut-out, isolated with tools and services to living the prosperous life.
interests: Agriculture, Borders and Security, Climate Action, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Fraud prevention, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Regional Policy, Youth
euInitiatives: EU humanitarian policies and aid in Nigeria and West Africa,  EU and the refugee crisis, Migration, EU and development, EU and Human rights, EU and Education
